text: Mother's Day is a 2010 remake of the 1980 movie Mother's Day. The movie is about three brothers who fail at robbing a bank and then try consulting their mother. They discover her house is being foreclosed on. Briana Evigan plays Annette. Rebecca De Mornay plays the mother. The movie got mixed reviews. title: Mother's Day (2010 movie)
